segments.text: This kitchen is a nightmare of sloppiness and neglect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink is disgusting; water's just wasting everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's streaming down the cabinet doors, soaking everything in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor's turning into a gross puddle that no one seems to care about.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing in it, drying a plate like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her unawareness is almost as repulsive as the mess itself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are adding to the filth by climbing around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's hand in the cookie jarâ€” who knows if it's clean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's wobbling in that wet spot; it's all so unhygienic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up, probably getting her shoes dirty too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the pretty garden view can't mask the interior grime.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how the water's damaging the wood; it's revolting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup makes my skin crawl with distaste.
segments.speaker: PAR
